website_summaries.verdict: Though it has a few issues, the picture quality and the trusted brand name make it a sound choice for consumers that want to experience 4K Ultra HD.
pros: Has 4K UHD that produces  crisp, clear picture quality with vibrant colors – owners rave about the true-to-life images
cons: Its available apps are limited, and its stand doesn't feel very sturdy
Turning up the volume to higher settings slightly distorts the sound

customer_reviews.title: Incredible TV pictures!
customer_reviews.text: Just got my new tv installed two days ago, I had a very nice JVC 44" HD prior to this one. Am an old fart so my eye sight while ok is far from perfect, when I viewed HD programs I could see a bit of improvements but didn't give me the WOW factor, however today I decided to watch some BLUE RAY movies ( Underworld series), well folks I just got my WOW factor maybe more LOL the picture quality and details are truly awesome, I am a very happy old fart camper! I highly recommend trying a 4K tv , SONY is my favorite brand! Beware once you try it you will end up buying one! LOL
customer_reviews.author: MrBelge

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup, minimal tinkering with adjustments
customer_reviews.text: The Sony XBR49X800D has greatly exceeded my expectations thus far. Easy setup, minimal tinkering with adjustments, high quality picture and even decent sound. Much higher quality compared with the 2 major brands that are highly rated but have given me nothing but trouble over the past 3 years. I would strongly recommend getting the Sony 800 series, or higher, and spending a bit extra if necessary. My only worry is long term reliability, and that cannot be determined for a few years. The other brands' mid-range sets I had lasted no more than 2.5 years. Not good enough for me. Buy Sony.
customer_reviews.author: marc slaff

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant Picture and great apps. I even like the remote that has a built in Microphone.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this TV for Exactly 1 year now and my wife and I love it. It's only gotten better with frequent updates to the integrated Android operating system. My only gripe is that the wireless adapter in the television only connects to 2.4 ghz networks and not 5Ghz, which can make it difficult to stream to high def content from my Plex Server. Other than that, It's a great TV and I even had Kodi installed on it.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Has Bluetooth but it won't connect to headphones.
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this tv except for one thing. The Bluetooth will not connect to Bluetooth headphones. I didn't expect Bluetooth on the TV when I bought it so I will not take a star away, but it makes no sense to disable this function. I paid $648 for this TV and at that price it was well worth it. I tried 2 different $500 4k 49" tvs and the picture was horrible. This TV looks great. Not as good as my OLED but for the price it was well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: SLS

customer_reviews.title: but it is hands down the best TV I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: I've had this setup for just a few days, but it is hands down the best TV I've ever had. The picture is amazing, the apps load up smooth and fast. My only real complaint is that Android TV could be better (and at some point, I'm sure Google will make some good strides on it). If you're looking to play Android Games on it, be warned, the system isn't quite strong enough. The latest riptide game has some frame issues. Lower tier games should run better.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: This wouldn't be so bad but you need to do it on a weekly ...
customer_reviews.text: Dont buy this tv if you plan to use the wifi feature. The tv keeps dropping the signal and the only fix so far is to unplug the tv and let it reset. This wouldn't be so bad but you need to do it on a weekly basis. If you google Sony wifi connect issues you will see many people with the same issue, and no good fix from Sony. Buy the Samsung.
customer_reviews.author: Frank H. Mustazza

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase...great for awhile but udder deal later on
customer_reviews.text: The screen started to go black after 3 months...had to factory reset every time turn on tv...then hdmi s would no longer connect to PlayStation 4 or bl u Ray player...never will i ever buy another song Brava POS...wish I could have given it 0 stars...by the way no fixes for black outs..Don't tells you to factory reset...hahaha jokes on me!
customer_reviews.author: Jester

customer_reviews.title: Great TV I love everything about it
customer_reviews.text: Great TV I love everything about it. I did get one with some issues but was quickly replaced and haven't had any problems with the new one.
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: Great TV
customer_reviews.text: Works about half the time with Google Home but it's a great Smart TV and is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: This TV is beautiful. Not much content streaming in 4k as of ...
customer_reviews.text: This TV is beautiful. Not much content streaming in 4k as of December 2016, but I've sampled "Dolphins" on Amazon Prime and holy bollock buster, what a difference. Pair it with HDR (high dynamic range) options, and the range of color within the frame is ridiculously spectacular. It feels like those giant IMAX screens or 4D rides in amusement parks in your living room. I'd highly recommend this TV.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan of the East Coast

customer_reviews.title: Crystal clear picture and color. Having 4 HDMI ports ...
customer_reviews.text: Crystal clear picture and color. Having 4 HDMI ports is a dream. Has a s/pdif port to hook a beast sound system to. Will not regret getting this.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Amazing TV
customer_reviews.text: TV came in a few days earlier than expected! This TV has amazing color and it's very bright, I only wish each HDMI port had its own picture profile/settings. But the HDR settings are amazing and it's so thin! I can't believe how advanced technology has come!
customer_reviews.author: Gabe

customer_reviews.title: Best TV I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Best TV I have ever owned, picture is great and I hope it lasts as long as the one it replaced (Sony Bravia) which is still working great at my sisters house.
customer_reviews.author: Joe and Les Robert

customer_reviews.title: It's a great TV. Android experience is great too
customer_reviews.text: It's a great TV. Android experience is great too. The first one they shipped had a dead pixel line. We returned it and got a new one (asked them to check for dead pixels). It worked out just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Aniket Nanhe

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sony is absolutely the best in 4K technology, I love the picture and the price was great too
customer_reviews.author: John M. Berry

customer_reviews.title: Sony xbr49x800D
customer_reviews.text: Wow more than I expected it's one of the great tv to buy in 2016 only only problem seem like there is no change channel button to the back of this tv only volume but other than that Amazing like Amazon :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and crisp picture
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful picture and love the feature that I don't have to use a separate cable remote.
customer_reviews.author: Smurfberry

customer_reviews.title: Awesome TV for the price
customer_reviews.text: Best budget 4k TV on the market. Works great with my PS4 Pro and the built in chrome cast has made casting from my phone and laptop a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: tyler

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the TV the apps are a little slow but overall good bang for my buck.
customer_reviews.author: Uwantjesse

customer_reviews.title: It's a Sony.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful picture, easy to setup and a joy to watch.
customer_reviews.author: Tresark

customer_reviews.title: Gave up, Netflix
customer_reviews.text: Was using the tv for a while. Then TV just gave up. No response whatsoever. Unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Brian C.

customer_reviews.title: Love our new tv.
customer_reviews.text: We love the tv. Got it quickly from Amazon - no issues. Easy to set up with our Google fiber account. Only negative so far is that we have to turn it up louder than our former Sony tv, Picture is great. Controls are easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: M. Wilkes

customer_reviews.title: Sony does it again
customer_reviews.text: I love this tv it's the perfect size and has excellent picture quality. And the speakers are great as well
customer_reviews.author: Andre P.

customer_reviews.title: Can't miss choice
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased. It looks great and performs even better. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: JIM

customer_reviews.title: Sony should ask for feedback to enhance it's Ardent Customers
customer_reviews.text: Cons:The volume is sub-par, the speakers are in the rear of T.V. therefore making it hard to hear normal conversation on the T.V. imagine dialing up the volume control to 50-60 to hear the news or a t.v.show :-( why would i want to hear most shows ie. News on my Sound Bar!?. . .. i only use the sound bar for Concerts and Movies, and this will be a first that my newer T.V. Doesn't have a Sleep Timer so the T.V. doesn't stay On all night after watching it past midnight. Pro's: the Picture is very impressive deep rich colors-HDR- makes this T.V.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Mo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent picture, easy set-up. 4k content looks amazing. At a great price for a 4K, UHD 2.2hdcp TV
customer_reviews.author: Peter Cesario Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Bad light bleed from the bottom edge of the screen
customer_reviews.text: Item brand new out of box has very bad light bleed from the bottom edge of the screen. I looked up a lot of possible fixed online through adjusting settings, but nothing helped. Initiating return, but Amazon is being very difficult about the return process due to the size and cost of this item.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Sony 49 inch TV
customer_reviews.text: The Sony TV is clear and very easily to read all alerts on the bottom of TV. Love It!!!!! Would tell people it was a GREAT buy!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Marcia Judisch

customer_reviews.title: Very good Sony
customer_reviews.text: All in all a great TV. Picture is excellent right out of the box. Plenty of adjustments for personal tastes. Sound is acceptable. High dollar features in a 49" set
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! Sony has a home run with this 4K HD TV.
customer_reviews.author: Howard Frost

customer_reviews.title: Great TV for the price
customer_reviews.text: After calibration (settings found online) this TV's picture quality is amazing, especially for this price bracket. System UI is running well so far but there was a short learning period to get used to the controls.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon_shopper

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Upgraded from an older Samsung that died after 7 years. Hope to get as much out of this one. Onboard Netflix and Youtube are a revelation. You can search for Android apps. Syncs perfectly with my PS3. Headphone jack works with my old computer sub and speakers with no buzz, which is a bonus. Oh yeah, amazing picture!
customer_reviews.author: Cecil Chest

customer_reviews.title: Great TV, but the internet requres google membership.
customer_reviews.text: The TV itself has an excellent picture and sound. But, as an internet TV you are limited to google and android software and apps, and can't download a thing or use some major features without signing into google, which I refuse to do. I get around that all by using Apple TV into an HDMI port.
customer_reviews.author: jbdind

customer_reviews.title: What an amazing TV this is
customer_reviews.text: Bought a Vizio first for 600$, wasn't impressed. But this. What an amazing TV this is. Everyone who sees it is super impressed with the definition. I watch movies and play Dark Souls and so far everything is 100%. It comes with Google play so you can get w.e you like. Thanks Amazon and Sony.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Stovich

customer_reviews.title: Sony, Sony, Sony in 4K!!
customer_reviews.text: Always buy Sony. They never disappoint and this tv lives up the standard. Beautiful color and clarity.
customer_reviews.author: D. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Sony XBR49X800D 49" Class 4K HDR Ultra HD TV
customer_reviews.text: I had a older Sony 46" with speakers on the side which took up more room than this one does. The picture is awesome especially for sports. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Dunph

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend. The top of the line. Believe what you want, but SONY is still KING.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Gobert

customer_reviews.title: Good 4k entry tv
customer_reviews.text: Good 4k entry tv, nice colors, good connectivity. I have noticed some flickering, but does not bother me. I have no issues with reflecting objects as my bedroom has a side window. Can’t beat the price. I would recommend to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Nito

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. The only 2 issue I have with it ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this during Black Friday deals. So far so good. The only 2 issue I have with it are: The system is kinda slow, sometimes you have to force-reboot it Bluetooth is pretty much useless. You can't connect Bluetooth headphones because it only supports keyboard/mouse/game controllers, but not headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Lulzim

customer_reviews.title: Fine picture, terrible software
customer_reviews.text: Picture is fine, but the built in software is very poor. Many apps are slow to load and respond. The audio controlled by the Sony software sometimes doesn't work or lags when you try to change the volume.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Great multi-purpose flexible use with 4 HDMI ports.
customer_reviews.text: 4 year update, something went wrong, display blurry & jittery. 1st impression, Great except internet required for most advanced features. using it as TV, for minimal cable service, Blu-Ray/DVD player for Movies and 4K computer monitor (three of four HDMI ports. (Currently no internet access where I'm living.) Auto switches to Sony Blu-Ray player HDMI port when you turn on the Blu-Ray player. Higher resolution than most computer monitors but not for gaming (only 30Hz refresh rate).
customer_reviews.author: Ray Beck

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great 4K tv with a HDR10, for the price! Picture really does look good with my PS4 Pro
customer_reviews.author: meganlee

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality TV display
customer_reviews.text: Avoid this TV - I have had two from Amazon that I have now returned. Two main faults with the TV. The first is brightness of the TV is far too low. The second, and this is the worst, is that both TVs had a strip of ~10 pixels across the bottom of the TV that were noticeably brighter than the rest of the TV.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Dale

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for living room or large bedroom!
customer_reviews.text: Pure perfection. I am in love. Easy to set up. Amazing picture. Mounted to wall in my bedroom and very sleek!
customer_reviews.author: AMG78

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't get any better
customer_reviews.text: Sony is the best. Picture clarity and color is remarkable!
customer_reviews.author: larry

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic TV
customer_reviews.text: Hands down best TV I ever owned for the price . Works perfect with Sony Playstation Pro system and looks incredible , very dark blacks an vibrant colors. Titan fall 2 and Dishonored 2 graphically look great. You won't be disappointed with this buy
customer_reviews.author: Cj W.

customer_reviews.title: It is actually nice to look at
customer_reviews.text: It is actually nice to look at, unlike most tv's. If you are particular about the way electronics look, as I am, this is the one for you. It's thin and sleek. The picture is good, it does a good job of up conversion and HD material looks good with rich colors. I have yet to see any 4K media on it but look for word to it. I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I have the 43" version of this TV and love it so I didn't think there would be issues ...
customer_reviews.text: I have the 43" version of this TV and love it so I didn't think there would be issues with the 49" version. The 49" has bad "light leak" on the bottom length of the TV (other reviews provide nice pics of what I'm talking about) This happens when there are darker colors in any mode and is super annoying. I returned it
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for the buck..
customer_reviews.text: The best television out there for the price. Very impressed with the quality and features of this tv. Streams content well and functions with the Xbox as I would expect. The only negative reviews as you see are people using this as a dedicated monitor.. yes this tv has that capacity, but really its built to be an actual Tv used for live broadcast, Blu-ray and gaming. On these aspect the tv excelled.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Mahan

customer_reviews.title: I love this TV
customer_reviews.text: This is the best picture quality TV I have ever had. The 4K resolution is really amazing. It works perfectly with my Xfinity HD, picture clarity is much upgraded compared to my former 1080P Sharp TV. Never seen a TV program so clearly on a TV screen and color is just great! It plays video stored on my portable hard drive with a single USB cable, again picture is the best I had. Have not yet tried any true 4k content but I am satisfied with the quality already. I am happy for this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Weidong

customer_reviews.title: Bad luck for me
customer_reviews.text: Serious,serious backlight bleeding at the bottom edge of the unit I got. At first I thought it was just the pattern of the system setup panel background, but then I found the same pattern no matter what I put on the screen (YouTube/bluray/photo/etc.) then I realized this is bleeding, a serious one. With this pattern you get distracted no matter what you watch with this TV, what a pity. Bad luck for me, returning the unit.
customer_reviews.author: Mona Peng

customer_reviews.title: No privacy with this TV
customer_reviews.text: Nice TV. Having to sign into Google to use the smart TV functions is a complete nonstarter. I'm not sure how much Sony gets for selling my viewing and browsing history to Google but I know it's not enough to get me to buy or recommend another Sony. I'd gladly have paid more money not to have that particular feature. I'll be using another device to access my content, which is a shame because the remote/interface is well done.
customer_reviews.author: Gerry Nasberg

customer_reviews.title: Maybe a bad egg?
customer_reviews.text: Received this item on 1/4/17 after ordering on Prime.. the tv unfortunately didn't work. It would not even turn on. We dropped it off at UPS and purchased the same one at a local audio store. We heard 'buyer beware' when buying electronics off of Amazon but our faithfulness to the company I guess got the best of us. ... called SONY support and was disconnected twice.
customer_reviews.author: Newport,Ri

customer_reviews.title: Poor Performance
customer_reviews.text: I can't get rid of the black bars on either side of the picture as my Panasonic Flat TV did with H-fill, Every time I go to widen the picture it would overfill the frame and soften the focus When the picture is in letterbox, no problems. It's crisp and sharp, the colors very good. However, I don't think Sony did their job well? I am still considering returning the product.
customer_reviews.author: Purpledog

customer_reviews.title: Best tv ever
customer_reviews.text: Wow. The utmost picture quality ever....The best TV set I got is definitely this one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great TV
customer_reviews.text: This TV is fantastic. The Sony processors are one of the best available. You can tell from just how quick the tv responds. The picture quality is great, I haven't been able to use the 4K or HDR in their true form yet, but the upscaling appears fine, and the color range is much better than my old Sony.
customer_reviews.author: Brendan Doyle

customer_reviews.title: Great TV - Needs a swivel stand as part of the package
customer_reviews.text: Only 4 stars due to having a stationary stand. TV itself has a great picture 4k programs/movies have incredible clarity and the colors pop off the screen.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sorry I had to return this TV but accessing the ...
customer_reviews.text: Sorry I had to return this TV but accessing the Internet is the main reason why I wanted a "smart TV" and this TV is missing this application. I also resent being told that I could not download this missing application unless I opened a Google or a Gmail account.
customer_reviews.author: Joscarb

customer_reviews.title: Sony, we have a problem
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this TV unless you enjoy talking to customer support and shipping TVs with FedEx. I got my original from Amazon. It had bleeding on the bottom. There was a line across the bottom about a 1/4 of an inch high that was significantly brighter than the rest of the screen. I called Sony and they shipped me a new one. The new one had the exact same issue. I'm now waiting on TV #3 to see if the issue is resolved. Sony has denied this is a known issue for the 2016 model. Seems unlikely I would be unlucky enough to get 2 (probably soon to be 3) with the identical problem.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: My Sony 4K
customer_reviews.text: Love my Sony 4K. Picture is very sharp! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: P. J. Barton

customer_reviews.title: my 55 inch Sony TV works perfect, but this 49 inch is no good
customer_reviews.text: I have grate faith in Sony products, my 55 inch Sony TV works perfect, but this 49 inch is no good. Problems: Picture is not sharp. Lines are fuzzy. Focus seams to be constantly adjusting its self in and out. I set it up right in front of my 55 inch and tried all the adjustments in an effort to get a picture as good as the 55 inch with no luck. Did I get a lemon or is there a problem with this particular model?
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Franz

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Was delivered and set up 2 weeks ago and it already needs replaced! Sony is replacing it very soon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible. I tried to like this TV but I ...
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. I tried to like this TV but I just can't. The remote does not even work, you have to press a button sometimes over 5 times before it registers. It is infuriating when trying to change the channel, you have to look at the screen while entering the numbers to make sure it even registers the buttons you push on the remote. My old 2007 32 inch Samsung's remote control works 10 times better, at least. It's pretty pitiful that a company such as Sony is making a TV 10 years later that can not even compete with the functionality of a TV 10 years older.
customer_reviews.author: john

product_meta.title: Sony XBR49X800D 49-Inch 4K Ultra HD TV (2016 Model)
product_meta.description:
Enjoy truly remarkable clarity, color and contrast with 4K HDR and TRILUMINOS Display for picture that’s closer than ever to real-world colors. Android TV adds Voice Search, Google Cast and a huge selection of apps, games and content from Google Play so you can watch your way.

AMAZON.COM
feature_bullets: Works with Alexa for voice control (Alexa device sold separately).
Dimensions (W x H x D): TV without stand: 43.1" x 25.3" x 1.8", TV with stand: 43.1" x 27.1" x 8.6"
4K Ultra HD resolution produces incredible clarity for a more lifelike picture

Accessories Included: Remote Control (RMF-TX200U), Batteries (R03), AC Power Adaptor (ACDP-160E01 or ACDP-160D01), AC Power Cord Spec (US 2Pin (w/o Polarity), C7), IR Blaster (1-849-161-11), Table Top Stand (Separate, assembly required)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars139 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
